instruction: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil and lemon juice until well combined. Then add the bulgur to the dressing and let it soak until it is soft and plumped, about 15 minutes.

Meanwhile, prepare the vegetables by washing, drying thoroughly and finely chopping them. When preparing the tomatoes, it helps to use a colander to drain the excess juice, which you can use in another recipe at a later time.
Place the chopped vegetables in a large bowl. Add the optional mint. Season with salt and pepper. Then pour the bulgur and dressing mixture over. Gently toss to combine.
Serve at room temperature or cold, with lettuce if desired.
Mix the zaatar with oil
Preheat the oven to 200 degerees C
Bake in the oven for 7 min at 200 degrees C the dough with the zaatar on it
Remove from the oven and enjoy them warm or cold
Sift the dry ingrediets together.
Make a well, then add the wet ingreients. Stir to combine.
Scoop the batter onto a hot griddle or pan.
Cook for two or three minutes, the fip.
Continue cooking until brown on both sides.
Boil water with salt
While waiting for the water to boil melt the butter in a pan and add the flour with cheese and spices to make the delicious sauce
add the pasta in the boiled water then drain the water and combine the pasta with the sauce
Mix the chicken with the shawarma spices
Heat up the pan with oil
Add the chicken to the pan and let them cook
Open the flat bread and add garlic sauce then add the chicken
Preheat the oven to 200 degerees C
Boil water with salt
Chop the onions and garlic add small and pepper
Add the meat with the garlic and onions in a pan with olive oil until the meat is cooked
Mix the tomato sauce in the pan
Put the pasta in the boiled water
Add all the ingredients in a pan in layers having cheese as a top layer and insert them in the oven until the cheese has melted on top.
Empty the zucchinis from the middle
Mix the meat , rice and tomato with sal and pepper in a bowl
Insert the mixture in the zucchinis and add them in pot filled with water
Wait for the water to boil and it is done!
Wash the rice
Boil the chicken in a pot
Mix the clean rice with ham and add them in a pot filled with water, wait until the water evaporates and you can serve it with chicken
Wash the rice
Mix the clean rice with ham and add them in a pot filled with water, wait until the water evaporates
add cocoa powder and milk powder in a cup with boiling water and mix well!
If you want you can add sugar:)

lace your colored cake batters near your baking pan. Take 1/3 of the first colored batter and scoop it with a large spoon into your pan in a down-up-down pattern. If you're using a small loaf pan (as shown here), use three large dollops of batter. If you're using a round tube or bundt pan, drop dollops of batter in the same pattern--down, up, down-- all the way around the pan.

Take 1/3 of your second colored batter. Scoop a dollop of the batter into each of the empty spaces to create a rough checkerboard pattern on the base of the pan. 1/3 of your total batter should be used at this point.
With the second 1/3 of the batter, create a second checkerboard pattern on top of the first. Alternate colors-- meaning, if a light colored square is on the bottom, put a dark colored square on top
Repeat the pattern for a third and final layer with all the remaining batter. You should have three checkerboard layers in your baking pan now.
Take your butter knife and swirl it through the batter, making rounded vertical zig-zags from one side of the pan to the other.

Wipe the excess batter from the knife. Repeat the swirling pattern in the opposite direction. If you're using a loaf pan, make long horizontal swirls. If you're using a round tube or bundt pan, swirl opposing zig-zags all the way around the pan to create a chain shaped swirl.
Now your cake is marbled and ready to bake! When it's baked, cooled, and sliced, you'll see nice, evenly marbled patterns. Your cake will have its own unique variations.
Boil water with salt and oil
Cut the cucumbers and lettuce
mix the crab with mayonaise and soy sauce
add the pasta in the boiled water then drain the water and combine the pasta with the crab and vegetables
Mix eggs and milk in a bowl
Preheat the pan with butter
Add the toast in the mixture from both sides and then fry it on the pan for 2 minutes on each side or till it is golden in color
Put the green beans in a pot with water and put it on the stove and wait it to boil
Cut the garlic and onions into small cubes
Put the garlic and onions in a pan with olive oil and add tomato sauce
Remove the green beans from the pot and mix it with the sauce
Serve it cold or hot with pita bread on the side
Wash all your vegetables
Chop lettuce onions tomatoes parsley and cucumbers
Squeeze the lemon and add salt pepper and olive oil
Mix everything together
Preheat the oven to 200 degerees C
Brush a 9 inch square baking dish with 2 tablespoons of melted butter
Whisk flour, 2 tablespoons white sugar, baking powder, and salt together in a large bowl. Work 3 tablespoons softened butter into flour mixture using your hands.
Beat milk and egg together in another bowl; pour into flour butter mixture, and stir with rubber spatula until a soft dough forms
Turn dough out unto a floured workspace and roll diugh into 1/4 inch thick rectangle. Brush surface of dough with 2 tablespoons melted butter
Whisk half cup sugar and cinnamon together in a small bowl. Sprinkle the remaining cinnamon suger over butter-brushed dough.
Roll dough around filling to foem a log; cut loh into 18 rolls and place rolls in the prepared baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until rolls are set, 20 to 25 minutes.
Bear confectioners' sugar, cream cheese, 1/4 cup softened butter, and vanilla extract togeter i a bowl until frosting smooth.
Top hot cinnamon rols with cream cheese frosting.
Wash the breasts thoroughly. If they are very thick then, slice them evenly, and yrim to a round shape.
Heat oil in a pan on a medium high flame. When the oil is hot enough, deep fry them on both sides fliping as needed.
Transfer them to aa kitchen tissue
Slice the burger buns, toast them. Place the patty over the bun.
Slice the tomatoes lettuce and onions and place them on the chicken.
Add the mayonnaise and the ketchup unto the buns and top it off with the other buns.
Preheat the oven to 350.
Mix sugar, flour, melted butter, eggs, cocoa powder, vanilla, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl until combined. Spread the batter into the prepared pan.
Bake in the preheated oven until top is dry and edges have started to pull away from te sides of the pan, about 20 to 30 minutes; cool before slicing into squares.
Mix seasoning igredients, drizzle 1 tablespoon oil over chicken, mix to coat. Sprinkle with seasoning, toss to coat.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add chicken, cook for 2 minutes. Turn amd cook for 15 minutes. Removee, reat for 2 minutes then chop them.
In the same skillet, add onion and garlic, cook for 1 minute. Add capsicum, cook for 2 minutes until onion is translucent.
Add diced chicken and water. Stir and cook for 2 minutes until reduces slightly.
Gently warm tortillas in microwave, then lay on work surface,
Place rice on lower third, top with chicken filling, corn, guacamole, and cheese then sprinkle with coriander, fold it up burrito style
Preheat vn to 170 degrees C
Cut the loaf in half, horizontally. Mix the butter, garlic, and parsley together in a small bowl. Spread butter mixture over the two bread halves.
Place on a sturdy baking pan and heat it for 10 minutes,
Remove the pan from oven Sprinkle parmesan cheese over the bread and retuen it in the oven for 2 to 3 minutes until the edges bread begin to toast and the cheese bubbles.
Remove from oven, let it cool for a minute. Remove the bread from oan and use a bread knife to cut into 1 inch thick slies, and serve immediately.
Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rollng dip. Stir in pasta and return to a boil.
Cook pasta uncovered, stirring occasonally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain and transfer into a large bowl.
Heat oi in frying pan over medium-low heat. Add onion; cook and stir until softened, about 3 minutes, Stir in pesto, salt, and pepper until warmed through.
Add pesto mixture to hot pasta; stir in grated cheese and toss well to coat.
Start by washing and draining the chickpeas and then placing them in a apot covered with water and simmer on medium heat.
Next cut the pita bread into small squares, drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and a bit of sumac.
Air fry them until golden brown.
To make the sauce, mix together the yogurt, tahini, garlic, and seasoning until well combined and smooth.
Prepare the garnish by chopping the parsley.
Layer the fettet just before serving by starting with pita bread, then the drained chickpeas, then the yogurt sauce, and finally drizzle a bit of olive oi with garlic and serve.
Place the quinoa in a fine-mesh strainer and rince under cold water, and then drain.
For one cup of quinoa, you need 2 cuos of liquid, water.
In a medium saucepan, combine water, the rinced quinoa, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cover wit a lid. Cook for 15 minutes.
Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes, then in a small bowl whisk together the olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
In another large bowl, combine the spinach, quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, and olives.
Drizzle alad dressing ams stir until the salad is cated with the dressing and serve
Put the chicken breast with cling film, and using a rolling pin beat the chicken breasts out to an even thickness.
Put the flour on a plate and add salt and pepper. Whisk the egg together in a small bowl. And on another plate mix together the bredcrumbs and parsley.
Dip chicken breast in the four and tap off any excess, the dip it in the egg to coat completely; finally. dip in the breadcrumb mixture and set aside.
Heat the butter and oil in a frying pan. Fry the breasts over a amedium heat for 3 to 4 minutes on eac side, then drain on kitchen paper before serving.
Serve with BBQ sauve and ketchup as a dip.
In a small bowl, combine avocado, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Mash with the back of the fork.
Top toasted bread with mashed avocado mixture. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle over desired toppings, and serve.
Beat the eggs lightly with a fork.
Melt the butter over medium heat and keep the temperature low.
Let the eggs sit for a minute then use a heatproof silicone spatula to gently lift the cooked eggs from the edges of the pan.
Tilt the pan to allow the uncooked egga to flow to the edge of the pan.
Add the filling of tomatoes, cheese, amd herbs when the eggs begin to set. Cook for a few more seconds.
Fold the omelette in half and slide with te help of a silicone spatula.
Cut the fruits into small cubes and combine then with wine.
Optional: add orange juice
